item.description:
In the past three months, we've had 40 new members! So if you are one of those 40 then come to our monthly social where you can meet other new (and old) members of the group. If you are new to this meetup AND new to the area then you definitely do not want to miss this opportunity to network.


As an added bonus, the venue has 1/2 priced apps until 6:30 and live music at 7. Please note that per venue policy, a $3 cover charge may be added if you come in during live music.

Please only RSVP if you are sure you will attend. If you are unsure of the venue location, use Google Maps or another tool first. Most tools offer both car and public transit directions.

Darryl's is running a great Groupon offer: 50% Off a meal for two or four. It must be bought by May 25 and can be used through September 14. Link-> http://www.groupon.com/deals/darryls-corner-bar-kitchen?sd=false&utm_campaign=UserReferral_dp&utm_medium=email&utm_source=uu4930945

***If you have not voted in the poll yet, do so now->>http://www.meetup.com/businessnetwork-960/polls/475132/***
item.name: Monthly Social and New Member Meetup
